message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between calcium chloride (CaCl2) and sodium carbonate (Na2CO3)?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between calcium chloride (CaCl2) and sodium carbonate (Na2CO3) is:

CaCl2 (aq) + Na2CO3 (aq) â†’ CaCO3 (s) + 2 NaCl (aq)
